function.name: nodes
function.description: Returns a (unsorted!) Map with nodes that share the same tags and are thus related content. The map with nodes is not yet sorted. The nodes are the keys, the values are their number of hits. To get the most relevant nodes first use the function 'hits'.

param.name: node
param.description: Source node related to t_keyword via t_metadata

param.name: type
param.description: Type of content to look for, defaults to type of the source node

param.name: max
param.description: Maximum number of result nodes to return

function.name: hits
function.description: Returns a sorted Map with nodes that share the same tags and are thus related content. The returned nodes are sorted by number of hits. To get the number of hits per node use the function 'nodes'.

param.name: node
param.description: Node related to t_keyword via t_metadata

param.name: type
param.description: Type of content to look for, defaults to type of the source node

param.name: max
param.description: Maximum number of result nodes to return
